positions.desc: Bob Casey supports public healthcare as a fundamental right, emphasizing the need for affordable access to quality care. He advocates for expanding Medicare's ability to negotiate prices with pharmaceutical companies to lower costs for American families. Additionally, he fights to protect programs like Medicaid and Social Security from cuts and expansion efforts. Casey believes that every Pennsylvanian should be able to access healthcare without worrying about affordability.

positions.desc: As a champion of renewable energy, Senator Bob Casey supports expanding investments in the industry to ensure Pennsylvania remains a leader in clean energy development and job creation. He highlights the growth of solar energy projects in rural areas, reducing operating costs for businesses while promoting economic growth. Additionally, he emphasizes the importance of investing in Pennsylvania's energy sector, citing President Biden's efforts to increase domestic energy production under his leadership. Casey also vows to protect and promote the interests of Pennsylvania's energy workers and communities.

sources.tweet:
I'm proud to announce that small business owners and farmers across Pennsylvania will benefit from @USDA's REAP program.
$24.1M toward creating jobs, lowering energy, and expanding access to clean energy. https://t.co/nQ09ys72sP

Solar energy is helping rural businesses across PA lower their operating costs while continuing to grow their businesses. Last week, I stopped by Remmey - The Pallet Company in Beaver Springs to see how they're making use of @usdaRD funding to purchase solar equipment. https://t.co/0ahjfEeX9E

Pennsylvania has always been an energy state and over the last two years, we have seen an influx of clean energy projects coming to our Commonwealth. I'll keep fighting to create new, good-paying energy jobs for PA workers. https://t.co/iMMa3eHIMQ

From putting food on the table, to powering our homes and businesses, Pennsylvania energy is a life-sustaining industry. I’m fighting to expand energy investments in the Commonwealth to ensure Pennsylvania’s proud energy sector can continue to be a leader for the future. https://t.co/7SQoo78KFV

positions.desc: Bob Casey supports limits on prescription drug prices as part of his efforts to reduce healthcare costs and expand access to care for all Americans. He advocates for giving Medicare the power to negotiate medication costs and has voted to pass legislation addressing price gouging and combating the fentanyl crisis in Pennsylvania. Casey's Price Gouging Prevention Act aims to crack down on excessive pricing by certain companies, particularly those producing and trafficking fentanyl.

sources.tweet: No one should be denied health care because they can’t afford it. I’m fighting to lower prescription drug costs and expand access to health care for all Americans.
I'll never stop fighting to end the fentanyl crisis in Pennsylvania.

We passed the FEND Off Fentanyl Act to target criminal organizations that produce & traffic fentanyl, but there’s more to be done to combat this crisis. 

My Stop Fentanyl at the Border Act would ensure border protection officers have the resources to stop it at ports of entry.

I fought to pass the FEND Off Fentanyl Act to target the criminal groups who produce and traffic fentanyl - but there's still more to do. My Stop Fentanyl at the Border Act will ensure border protection officers have the resources to detect it at ports of entry.
Working families can't afford to pay for corporations’ record profits. The Price Gouging Prevention Act would   make sure they don't have to.

Millions of Americans are struggling to afford their prescription drugs, that's why I fought to give Medicare the power to negotiate the cost of medications. It was great to be in Pen Argyl last week to celebrate a huge victory for families across the Commonwealth. https://t.co/8ZKf4fIONt

Today, I voted to pass the Kids Online Safety & Privacy Act to make sure internet companies are protecting kids from bullying, mental health issues, and predators. This is an important step to protect our children's wellbeing against growing threats online. https://t.co/fSYGL0HlVU

I fought to give Medicare the power to negotiate prices with drug companies to lower costs for American families. Today, Medicare rolled out newly negotiated prices for 10 of the most popular drugs in the U.S. https://t.co/DOiGpW0Oms
Big corporations are making record profits while working families pay higher prices. It's called greedflation and my Price Gouging Prevention Act will crack down on it.

Nearly a decade ago, I passed the ABLE Act to help people with disabilities save for their futures without losing federal benefits. Yesterday, I announced $130 million invested in PA ABLE accounts, showing how well this program is working here in the Commonwealth. https://t.co/Wk3PmZ4YzG

positions.desc: Bob Casey has consistently demonstrated a strong stance against abortion rights, voting against measures that support reproductive freedom and contraception access. He has expressed disappointment in Senate Republicans for failing to protect women's rights, particularly in light of the overturning of Roe v. Wade. However, he also emphasizes his commitment to supporting veterans' care through legislation such as the PACT Act and addressing rising antisemitism.

sources.tweet: Make no mistake: IVF acess is in jeopardy because of the fall of Roe v Wade. But when given the opportunity to protect access to fertility treatments today, Senate Republicans have once again failed to do so. American women know that actions speak louder than words.

But make no mistake: reproductive rights are still under attack. Extreme politicians are going to keep pushing to ban abortion nationwide and take away the right to contraception, and we're going to fight them every step of the way.

This is huge news: 1 million PACT Act claims have been granted and our veterans are getting the treatment they need for toxic exposure.

I was proud to fight for the PACT Act, but our work to ensure our veterans are cared for is never done.
https://t.co/kpwP1HetmW

Last week, Senate Republicans voted against the right to contraception, and today they voted against protecting IVF for families trying to conceive.

Actions speak louder than words. Republican politicians are again proving that they can't be trusted on reproductive rights.

In the two years since the overturning of Roe v. Wade, the impacts of the Supreme Court's dangerous decision are clear. States are passing total abortion bans and access to IVF and contraception is under threat.

Stories like Scott and Michelle’s are why I fought to pass the PACT Act. We owe everything to our veterans and we should make sure they're taken care of when they get back home.
https://t.co/lm6ipJDkkO

The fentanyl crisis has impacted communities across Pennsylvania. On Fentanyl Awareness Day, it's important to spread awareness of the dangers of fentanyl, and it's why I've been fighting for legislation to end fentanyl trafficking. https://t.co/gSwXs4HGqB
